spell.name: Mephitic Vapors
entries: You douse a 20-foot radius area centered on a point you can see within range with acrid slime, which remains for the spell's duration. The area becomes difficult terrain, and any creature wholly within the area is {@condition blinded} and can't take reactions.
A creature that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} poison damage and {@damage 2d8} acid damage and one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d8} poison damage and {@damage 1d8} acid damage for each slot level above 6th.
